flawed_nl_solution:
Since there are 1000 milliliters in 1 liter, then 3 liters is equal to 3 x 1000 = <<3*1000=30000>>30000 milliliters.
She needs to drink 30000/500 = <<30000/500=60>>60 sets of 500 milliliters of water.
So, she will be able to drink a total of 3 liters after 60 sets x every 2 hours = 120 hours.
#### 120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
